Text: MAIN Homepage Data Cc FYI Based on consultation among MAIN staff and with the MAIN PC chair as well as the chair of the newly form MAIN Security Working Group we will take or have taken the following actions in the interest of bulk power system physical security All data on the MAIN home page formerly considered public but now deemed to have the potential to be used in sabotage acts against the interconnected electric systems is no longer available for immediate download Those entities who have a valid regular use of such data will be given password access Current MAIN homepage passwords will work and anyone who has OASIS access via TradeAgent will automatically have access via the the links provided on the OASIS after login Anyone who has a valid but infrequent use of such data will be screened before such data is supplied This will be done through validation of phone andor street address as well as company affiliation as necessary In short we will know the person who has asked for data Instruction andor forms will be available on the web to facilitate item above A modest charge to accomplish item may also be required At a minimum the following formerly public data is included in this protected group All MAIN electric system maps Detailed capacity reports such as the Parts of the FERC submittal Detailed roster information outage listings seven days or older ATC cases Transmission Assessment reports TASG FSSG All other power flow cases MDB MMWG etc I recognize that reports such as the and FERC also reside publicly on the FERCDOE sites Efforts will be made to have such data removed from the government sites as well and I understand that FERC yesterday has already taken such action Please feel free to contact me if you have any question Regards Len Januzik Len Januzik Director of Engineering MAIN Coordination Center Phone Parkview Boulevard FAX Lombard IL
